ðŸ“– Summary: PyApp is a tool designed to wrap Python applications, creating standalone, self-bootstrapping binaries for various platforms. It offers features like optional management commands for self-updates and highly configurable runtime behavior. This allows developers to easily distribute their Python applications as single executable files.
